Initializer# init(location:timeOffset:size:opacity:force:azimuth:altitude:secondaryScale:)

iOS 14.0+iPadOS 14.0+Mac Catalyst 14.0+macOS 11.0+visionOS 1.0+

```
init(
    location: CGPoint,
    timeOffset: TimeInterval,
    size: CGSize,
    opacity: CGFloat,
    force: CGFloat,
    azimuth: CGFloat,
    altitude: CGFloat,
    secondaryScale: CGFloat
)
```
